value.name: Royal Family 'shuts the door' on Prince Harry and Meghan Markle with tight-lipped tactic
value.description: The Royal Family have 'no space' for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle anymore, according to Princess Diana's former butler, who claims the Firm now have a new tactic to deal with them

value.name: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Are Heading to Canada This Month for a Special Celebration
value.description: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are heading to Canada for an exciting countdown.

value.name: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Have So Many New Projects at Netflix
value.description: Netflix's content chief Bela Bajaria shared details about Meghan Markle and Prince Harry's upcoming projects with the streamer.

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle to return to Canada in just a few weeks time
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle first spent some month living in Canada when they quit the Royal Family in 2020.

value.name: Netflix Top 10 mainstay cancelled after one season
value.description: Netflix has cancelled action-comedy series Obliterated after just one season, which came out only a few months ago on 30 November. The series spent six weeks in the Netflix Top 10 for English-language series, peaking at No 1 in Week 2.

value.name: Netflix Chief Teases Meghan Markle and Prince Harry's Upcoming Projects, from Movie to Unscripted Shows
value.description: Chief Content Officer Bela Bajaria shared what the Duke and Duchess of Sussex are working on at the Next on Netflix event

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan ‘set to release new Netflix documentaries’
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex are also working on a scripted television series and a film adaptation as part of their $100m deal

value.name: 'I didn't expect to be drawn into UK internal issues!': Anti-monarchy Jamaican PM Andrew Holness breaks silence on Harry and Meghan after their visit to the Caribbean country ...
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan met Prime Minister Andrew Holness who has previously said he intends to ditch the monarchy and warned Prince William and Kate they'd never rule the island.

value.name: Harry and Meghan, the ‘soft power’ Sussexes, still divide opinion
value.description: Letters: Desmond Hewitt thinks Hirschman’s hypothesis has played out perfectly, Anna Yu supports them, Colton Richards just sees two people watching a film, while Rosemary Slawinska says Harry’s treat

value.name: Harry warned to ‘lay off’ Kate as Meghan mulls ‘explosive’ career move
value.description: Paul Burrell worked for Princess Diana for more than a decade until her sudden death in 1997, and claimed Harry 'has a nerve' to upset his sister-in-law. “I understand why they are upset, because Kate went to great lengths to find out if a royal life was for her and it caused her issues,

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle reveal they will spend Valentine's Day in Canada
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex will be spending Valentine's Day 2024 celebrating a cause close to their hearts, as they will attend the Invictus Games' One Year to Go event later this month in Canada.

video.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle reveal their 2024 Valentine Day plans – all the details

value.name: Prince Harry's heart-warming four-word remark about George and Charlotte
value.description: The Duke of Sussex was very close with his niece and nephew before he left the Royal Family in 2020 and fell out with his elder brother Prince William.

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's future at Netflix revealed before contract expires
value.description: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are facing the end of their Netflix deal, but it seems all is not lost as the streaming service's chief content officer has made a big announcement

value.name: Harry and Meghan call for urgent change to protect children on social media
value.description: It comes after a US Congressional hearing on the issue where Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg apologised to parents of children who killed themselves over online abuse. | ITV National News

value.name: Duke and Duchess of Sussex working on a 'bunch' of Netflix projects
value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex are developing “a bunch” of projects with Netflix including documentaries and a film, according to a senior executive at the streaming giant. The firm’s chief content officer Bela Bajaria told a Hollywood event the couple’s projects include “a couple of unscripted things” and a series.

value.name: Harry and Meghan Say No Parent Can Keep Their Child Safe From Social Media
value.description: Andrew Milligan/Pool/ReutersPrince Harry and Meghan Markle have issued an emotional statement saying that parents are powerless to keep children “safe” from social media platforms.The statement on their Archewell website comes after Mark Zuckerberg and other social media CEOs appeared Wednesday before the U.

value.name: The Crown star Dominic West reveals he 'stayed in bed for two days' after reading poor reviews
value.description: Dominic West revealed that he spent "two days in bed" after reading the reviews for the final season of The Crown.

value.name: Harry and Meghan busy with ‘a bunch’ of new Netflix projects
value.description: Shedding light on the future of their deal with Netflix, the company’s chief content officer Bela Bajaria said Harry and Meghan’s Archewell Productions is gearing up to deliver at least three new projects, including a film and “a couple of other unscripted things”.

value.name: Harry and Meghan share rare and emotional message as they call for urgent change to child safety online
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have issued a rare and emotional message on child safety on social media. Harry and Meghan spoke out after chief executives of Meta, TikTok, X and other social media giants gave evidence before the US Senate Judiciary Committee on Wednesday.
